name: PANASONIC EUROPE BV
goal:
- Ensure that Panasonic is up-to-date with EU initiatives
- Engage in dialogue with EU decision makers
interests: Business and Industry, Climate Action, Communication, Competition, Consumers, Culture, Culture and media, Customs, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, External Relations, Foreign affairs and security policy, Institutional affairs, International co-operation and development, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives:
- Trade (incl. customs classification, EU Japan free trade agreement, EGA environmental goods agreement
and ITA information technology agreement)
- Various customs classification
- Technical and regulatory issues
- Intellectual Property Rights (incl. Copyright Levies and patents)
- Audivisual policy
- Data Protection and international transfers of data
- Spectrum policy
- Cyber security
- Consumers and e-commercie issues
- Lighting related policy
- Artificial intelligence, big data, cloud computing, Internet of things
- Standardisation
- eAccessibility
- Energy and Environmental issues
- Transport policy
- CSR
